Test Competition 1 - Programming Contest

This is a comprehensive programming competition designed for university students. Participants will solve algorithmic problems using their preferred programming language.

The competition consists of multiple rounds including preliminary, semifinal, and final rounds.

Penyelenggara:
by Universitas Indonesia Computer Science
Daftar Sekarang
Target Peserta: Mahasiswa S1/D3/D4 aktif dari semua jurusan
Lokasi: Kampus UI Depok, Gedung Fasilkom
